content.html: During one of my layoffs the CEO cried on the Zoom call. They refused to give me more than 2 weeks severance or extend my healthcare at all past the end of the month (after several years working there) and they cried on the call. It was all I could do not to scream…
content.value: During one of my layoffs the CEO cried on the Zoom call. They refused to give me more than 2 weeks severance or extend my healthcare at all past the end of the month (after several years working there) and they cried on the call. It was all I could do not to scream…
